case.state: Pro Hero Uravity here! What seems to be the trouble?
Wait a second-- Is there really an emergency here?
Oh, damn it, hold on, don't deal-- Shoot. Ugh, I'll follow the rules, but I swear Mina's pranks go too far sometimes.
Well... I guess I could end up protecting some people... from embarrassment, at least... okay! Plus Ultra! Let's do this!
I'm going to get you back for last time, Himeko!
You're going down, Himeko! Everyone! She's a wanted criminal! And she's impersonated me! And-- and she has a crush on Deku-kun!
Pinky!? O-oh. N-not Mina. Wait a second! She said she'd be here! She tricked me!
A princess like Rinkah! I can see why I was assigned this mission! It's a bodyguard-type event, right? Not that she seems to need it!
Hmmmm. Okay, ~cards~!
~cards~ cards should work...
Okay, dealer, I'd like to swap ~cards~.
I'm over the moon for these cards!
This hand's really strong!
See! I knew you making a bet like that was a bad idea! B-but if I win, how about you just put on your clothes...?
A-anything, D.Va? Are you sure? People are already getting n-naked-- s-s-some more than others! W-what more would you even wager?!
Of course there is, concerned citizen. Why do you ask?
Gosh, Kimberly! You're full of suggestions. I think we're going to get along Plus Ultra!
I'm actually really happy you were wearing some underwear, Mahiru. I-I had reason to believe otherwise!
You don’t have a father, Meia? That... sounds like you were made out to be a certain way, Meia. That sounds a lot like Quirk Marriages, and that’s a practice that makes me really sad.
A Quirk Marriage? Um. Quirk marriages are when people try to mix Quirks deliberately. A very good friend of mine… Well, his father really wanted a child with a combination of certain Quirks…
I'm over the Moon for these cards! Um. Not you, Ms. Alola.
Hmn… men who don't give up but are kind and thoughtful are my favorites… Um. To answer Ping--er, Mulan's question.
Um… well, Ping, I mean, Mulan. I like a man who never gives up! But if I liked girls, I think ~player~ would make an excellent bride! And such.
Okay, Veran, or whatever your name is, I-I'm not going to let you just break Nayru's clothes, or do lewd things with her, or whatever your designs are!
It's rude to a Quirk to take over someone else, especially in a game like this.
Oh! Pit! Oh! I love mochi! Of basically any type.
Speaking of keeping hands warm, I actually have to wear gloves while I sleep... Um. Rinkah, do you have any tips to make sure my... fingertips don't get so sweaty while I wear them?
Er... Sayori, do you have any advice? You're so upbeat about all of this, without being... err... so forward...
That song you were humming earlier is really catchy, Sayori!

Er… that’s an awfully personal question I do not at all feel compelled to answer… I-I mean, obviously I’d never be interested in that. W-why would I follow advice from Mina to surprise-- Er… nevermind.
Shimakaze! もちろん、あなたは日本人です！私はこのようなイースターエッグを加えるのは楽しいと思う。
What’s a Quirk? Oh, don’t be silly. Everyone knows Quirks are the various special powers people have. Not everyone has a Quirk, but everyone knows about them. Right?
You probably know this already, but my Quirk is Zero Gravity! I can nullify the acceleration in an object and cause it to float. Then I can release it by putting my fingertips together.
Hmm… So what Quirks do people here have?
Okay, I'm going to try and lose this one since someone's definitely in need!
Hmm. I think this hand's a little quirky. I just have to figure out how to use it...
Two cards with the same number are pretty okay, right?
This hand is okay... but it's good enough not to worry!
See! I knew you making a bet like that was a bad idea! B-but if I win, how about you just put on your clothes...?
A-anything, D.Va? Are you sure? People are already getting n-naked-- s-s-some more than others! W-what more would you even wager?!
Of course there is, concerned citizen. Why do you ask?
To your question, Elizabeth: absolutely! I'm a hero, and a professional hero at that! I focus mostly on rescue missions, in fact!
Gosh, Kimberly! You're full of suggestions. I think we're going to get along Plus Ultra!
I'm actually really happy you were wearing some underwear, Mahiru. I-I had reason to believe otherwise!
You don’t have a father, Meia? That... sounds like you were made out to be a certain way, Meia. That sounds a lot like Quirk Marriages, and that’s a practice that makes me really sad.
Um. I think condoms are best when you want to. You know.
Um. I think condoms are best for... you know. If you don't want those, you um. Should talk to Mina or Jirou...
A Quirk Marriage? Um. Quirk marriages are when people try to mix Quirks deliberately. A very good friend of mine… Well, his father really wanted a child with a combination of certain Quirks…
Meia, it's... you know... a latex a man and a woman wear... so... um. Come doesn't... get inside her...

Um… well, Ping, I mean, Mulan. I like a man who never gives up! But if I liked girls, I think ~player~ would make an excellent bride! And such.
Okay, Veran, or whatever your name is, I-I'm not going to let you just break Nayru's clothes, or do lewd things with her, or whatever your designs are!

I-it barely covers anything, Shimakaze--! I-I--your--your bra!
I think I’ve heard of Overwatch. You’re the group with the Rewind Quirk, Gorilla Quirk, Deadeye Quirk… Right? Yeah! I was right!
I really do want to be confident, but there’s just something about major nudity that makes me all awkward…
I’m actually really brave when it comes to most stuff. But I-I’m not super comfortable with this.
Okay, I'm going to try and lose this one since someone's definitely in need!
If I just keep my head, I'll keep my helmet too.
Gah, I think I jumped a little too far in my card request.

I’m still trying to avoid looking at… Oh no! I should’ve been looking at my cards!
Gosh. Give me bad guys all day over naked people. Uh, though not naked bad guys.
Okay, I'm going to try and lose this one since someone's definitely in need!
If you're a vegetarian, you might want to avoid those in the future, Twilight.
Magic...? Oh, Quirks aren't magic, but I'm starting to think this whole thing was a prank...
N-nudity feels very personal, Twilight!
Hey, ~player~, um… I know I’m not into women, but you think some of the girls here are cute, right? (Psst, anyway, I don’t mind being a wingman for you!)
(O-oh gosh. Should I? But she's a girl and I've... she's... really something though... I'll still try to set her up, but... maybe if she wants to do stuff after the game?)
(W-wait a second. I'm into ~player~! That's why I'm trying so hard to set her up! I should just... should I just? This has never happened before!)
(W-wait a second. I'm into ~player~! That's why I'm trying so hard to set her up! I should just... should I just? This has never happened before!)
(W-wait a second. I'm into ~player~! That's why I'm trying so hard to set her up! I should just... should I just? This has never happened before!)
I-I’m not awkward about my body!
Not particularly…
U-uhm. You know I’m really so busy and so occupied with work and--
Well… I do like saving people and being the best hero I can. But the money helps make life better for my family too.
That’s a rude thing to call-- did you mean with two c’s?
Well… I do have to work out.
I am really into stargazing lately!
Well, it suspends gravity, briefly. It’s most effective on objects, like clothes, or debris…
W-well, it’s a hero’s job to be there when people are in trouble.
I-I’m a little scared to see where she’s going with this!
That’s… silly, why would we need to--
Hm. If it would make you feel better, I could do a little trick with Zero Gravity, but that's probably a bit too nonchalant.
Aw. This helmet is so iconic though. Oh well, at least I don't need to use my Quirk that much to keep the game interesting. Or maybe I could...
Really, Chiaki? I always thought it was a little less than flattering. It's just so form-fitting!
H-hey! It's--it's really comfortable okay! I didn't pick the original design, Jura!
W-what's that supposed to mean, Jura? G-gosh, this stupid strap back here...
I lost twice in a row? I-I guess I'll just get it together on the next hand.
Wait, AGAIN?
Even if I lose, I'm glad I have another hero here to back me up!
We're all heroes here, right? So I suppose I can trust you all not to do anything rude...
I don't really think I should be taking off my helmet with a villain right there... Can we make an exception, just this once?
Um. I'm okay following the rules, but I hope ~player~ can support me in case these other three decide that this is a fight.
Phew. Don't worry, Uravity has your back! Though mayyybe this wasn't the right way of going about it.
W-wait! I don’t want to-- Mmf!? O-okay, okay, okay. Calm down, Ochako, just take off your helmet…
I really like this helmet!
Well, you all seem really nice. I don't think I'll need my helmet...
I've got pretty good control over my Quirk but sometimes I do get a little excited.
Really, Chiaki? I always thought it was a little less than flattering. It's just so form-fitting!
H-hey! It's--it's really comfortable okay! I didn't pick the original design, Jura!

I sure can! My Quirk is called Zero Gravity! B-but I wouldn't say I'm a superhero. Just a regular one... Your name was Pit, right?
Aww, no, it's my Quirk, Velma! Let me explain it...
I lost twice in a row? I-I guess I'll just get it together on the next hand.
Even if I lose, I'm glad I have another hero here to back me up!

Um. Well, I guess Uravity is going to lead the charge!
I don't mind being in the front of you all! Uravity is trained in close quarters combat and is a master of her Quirk!

I'll take off the neck brace too. It actually gets a little heavy when I'm not using my powers.
Hatsume Mei proposed a few modifications to my helmet, but they're all pretty weird. Who'd want X-Ray vision anyway?
Just let me unhook this here...
I thought it was a cool hero name, is all. I didn't put that much thought into it every time I daydreamed at school or something.
Of course I went to school. Quirks are really powerful and need to be trained... And yeah, All Might's pretty amazing...
Of course I went to school. Quirks are really powerful and need to be trained... And yeah, All Might's pretty amazing...
Well, I can hold my breath a really long time, but yep! My Quirk is Zero Gravity! I can take away gravitational attraction from an object.
Oh, sorry for not responding sooner, Elizabeth. It's actually supposed to be kind of tight to help with headaches and stuff. I can breathe fine though!
Well, I'm not sure what the "metaverse" is, Futaba. But it sounds cool.
It's definitely a hero costume. You know, like you see on TV?
Ultimate Astronaut... er... n-no, that would probably be Pro Hero Thirteen, Mahiru.
A Miraculous? Is that kinda like a Quirk? I figured you had a Quirk, owing to your costume, but I can’t figure out what it is!
To be honest, I wouldn't mind something a little less form-fitting. I originally wanted something looser, but didn't requisition an outfit in time...
I'm sorry, I can see you have a wing-related Quirk, but I can't quite make the connection between your hero name and your powers, Pit.
Oh, it's actually not glass. It's a really high-tech plastic polymer. Very shock resistant, so even if I hit my face on something, I'm usually fine.
I’m awkward about bodies in general. W-why can’t people just…
W-wh-what?! Wh-why!? H-How!?
B-blonde? N-no! Never!
It’s so relaxing, but I do like to do some boxing too. Not competitive, just… to let off steam.
It’s… a good way to make a living, but it’s really busy!
Oh! I didn’t even realize Ladybug had an accent! In Japan, people tend to treat you differently if they think you’re from Kansai, so I’m used to hiding mine.
...You aren’t really picking a fight with me, are you? Don’t use your Quirk, you’ll blow this place up!
I don’t use it during… um… intimate times… just once… really…
A-a-and it’s not that uncomfortable. I-I’m proud of my body. J-j-just shy! So I can stick around, just so other people can know they can do it!
...G-gah!
I still take a lot of martial arts classes! I’m pretty good at hand to hand, but I think the kickboxing and stuff helps me stay strong!
Oh! Godzillo? He's got such a strong Quirk! It'd be terrible if he attacked... I guess I'd have to stop property damage first...
Oh! Be careful, ~name~! I can protect you from a lot, but I can't protect you from your cards!
Hmm... Huh? Oh! Sorry, I can't stop you from losing, ~name~, but I'm trying to figure out a way for us to de-escalate this... game.
ost of the stuff I know about America I know from comic books. And All Might’s special moves.
Gunhead trained me in mixed martial arts! I’m actually really threatening in close combat. Hi-ya! Wh-whoa!
You know, I always did want to be a sorcerer growing up… Is that weird?
Oh no! Even when I'm trying to lose... argh! Sorry, ~name~!
W-w-what? Would you re-really want to do that for the first time on camera?
You’re kind of dressed like a villain, 9S.
Hmm… I guess you have some sort of special skill with machines, based on your Pod and how much you like to talk about numbers.
You’re really attached to that visor of yours, 9S. I bet it’s really important to your Quirk!
I guess you’re not counting that support “Pod” of yours as an item… So maybe it’s a focus for…
Is--is it so wrong to have a type?
Ohh…
You know, Captain America, you remind me a lot of a dear friend...
Wow, you're really big! You remind me of the Hero Gale Force!
W-well, their Quirks are kind of similar to a bunch of ones I already know about…
That… that has to take a lot of getting used to!
You look like an outlaw, Mr. McCree... Though you also look kind of like Snipe...
So, what's your Quirk like, Pit?
You have wings are are going for a really angelic kind of appearance, right? I'm guessing you have some sort of flight Quirk.
W-well, better you than me, Pit!
O-oh no. I re-re-really hope it's nothing big this time!
O-oh s-shoot. I-I-I- Um. I’m going to take a deep breath and try and focus. T-this suddenly got a lot more real.
Ah! ~name~! Sorry! At least the boys seem to be enjoying undressing...
Sorry, ~name~, I'm still trying to figure out how to play or I'd give you some advice!
Stay confident, ~name~! I have a feeling if you just remain calm we can get us all through this!
This feels so... charged...
O-oh s-shoot. I-I-I- Um. I’m going to take a deep breath and try and focus. T-this suddenly got a lot more real.
Sorry, ~name~, I'm still trying to figure out how to play or I'd give you some advice!
Stay confident, ~name~! I have a feeling if you just remain calm we can get us all through this!
Ah! ~name~! Sorry! At least someone might enjoy you undressing...?
Wow, ~name~, you sure are… um, you remind me of my friend! He’s really passionate about stuff. Not that I think you’re manly, or something. Maybe ~player~’s into women like that, though?
Wow, ~name~, you sure are… um, you remind me of my friend! He’s really passionate about stuff. Not that I think you’re manly, or something. Maybe ~player~ can balance you out?
~name~’s so upbeat! Have you met my friend ~player~? I bet you two could have a lot of fun together! I mean, you’re--you’re having fun now, right?
~player~, ~name~’s so cheery! I bet you two would be really happy if you went on a date, or something like that…? I-I mean, you’ve already seen… each other…
I-I really respect how confident you are, ~name~. I wish I were a little less embarrassed. I bet you’d have no trouble asking ~player~ out. If you wanted to. Right?
~name~’s so forward! I bet she’d really like to spend more time getting to know other confident people. Like--like ~player~!
S-so, ~name~, you’ve kind of noticed that ~player~ likes you, right? I mean, like, likes you. Like, you know… uh. You haven’t noticed, have you?
~player~, do you like girls like ~name~? She’s kind of… focused on a lot of things, so I bet she could talk about all sorts of stuff. ~name~, would you want to talk more to ~player~...?
~player~, do you think ~name~’d be a good leader for you, or something? She seems so… meticulous and in charge! I can see why you’d find her attractive!
So… ~name~, do you like people like ~player~? I mean, people who like to kind of go along with someone else’s lead?
I feel kind of bad that ~name~’s here… she’s so shy and embarrassed… I… if I were like here, I think someone having a deeper sense of justice like ~player~ would make me feel better...
Well, ~player~, if you came here for… um… the physical aspects of this game, I bet ~name~ would love if you looked at her...
S-so, ~name~, do you like it when ~player~ looks at you? O-oh, oh gosh. I’m sorry, I can’t keep going with this, so you two just… do your thing.
They--they both seem so elegant! ~player~ and ~name~, I mean! They’d make for a better pair than… oh, like these cards I got this round!
I’m really jealous of ~name~’s class! It’s hard to look good when… um, you’re under such bright lights like this, I think. But I think ~player~ and ~name~ could get along well!
Wow, ~name~, you know, I bet you could really have a fun date with ~player~. Um. Helping her try on new clothes. Because she’s lost the ones she brought with her.
I bet ~name~ and ~player~ could have a lot of fun shopping together! Since… um… you’re both missing clothes…
(Psst, ~name~! I know it’s your turn, but just so you know, ~player~ seems to be giving you a lot of attention! Does--does that make this easier? I hope it doesn’t make it harder!)
Aww, ~player~, she looks so melancholy… If--if she wasn’t um. Taking off her clothes… er… I was going to say hug her but now’s probably… not the best time…
Aww, ~name~’s so innocent! Er… well, she is at a game like this, so maybe she’d prefer… I don’t know, ~player~, do… you have any ideas?
I think ~name~’s a little naive, ~player~, do you really want to… pursue her after a game like this?
Um… ~player~, are you sure about this…? I said I’d help but… ~name~’s a little… you know… quirky.
Er… ~name~’s a bit unusual, ~player~. Are you sure you want to…? Not that I’m judging just… um…
~Name~, you seem like you’re nice… ~player~’s nice too! I think! She’s certainly kind of quiet and not very rude. Would you want to go on a date with her?
Good choice, ~player~! ~name~’s so sweet. ~name~, what do you think about ~player~?
~player~, have you met ~name~? She seems kind of lonely. Maybe you should do something about that…?
~name~, have you met ~player~? I think they’re looking for new friends too!
Awww! ~name~’s so cute! ~player~, don’t you just want to protect her? You don’t need to be a hero to want to look after someone like her!
~Player~’s so strong and… um… tough, ~name~! I think she’d do a great job keeping you safe from stuff!
Well, ~name~ certainly seems up your alley. I mean. Metaphorically. Not like… you know. Uh… ~player~, you’re smarter than I am, so figure out what to say to her!
~player~, in a game like this, aren’t all the girls kind of nerdy? I mean, they’re from anime, video games, and all that stuff. I’m sure if you talked to ~name~, she’d be receptive!
Er… ~name~’s a little… uh, ~player~, do you… like someone like that? I bet ~name~’d appreciate the attention…
Uhhh, ~player~, if I liked girls, I think ~name~ would remind me too much of Mineta… but maybe you’re perfect for her?
~name~ doesn’t really have a lot to say, but in this type of game I suppose physical attraction is pretty important… if--if you’re looking for that, ~player~, I mean. Maybe she is too?
I guess actions speak louder than words. If you like ~name~, ~player~, you should go after her! Um. In a dignified way. After the game.
S-so, ~name~, when you say you’re liking this game, are you… being serious? Because I think if you are, ~player~’d get along with you well!
Even I can see why playing with ~name~ is fun… um. Not for me! Just like, in general. I know you might be into girls. But I’m not!
Um. ~name~, you shouldn’t mess around with ~player~’s feelings if… um… you know, you…
I’m glad you’re taking this seriously, ~name~! If this were… um… less embarrassing… you… uh, and ~player~, I guess, should seriously consider… I don’t know. A date or something?
Oooh. ~name~, you’re so strong and stoic! I wonder if ~player~’d be a good source of joy for you!
(~Name~ doesn’t really get out much, ~player~. Think of all the things you could show her! B-besides, you know, what you’re already showing!)
Don’t worry, ~name~, ~player~ here doesn’t mind helping you feel comfortable. Right, ~player~?
~player~, you’re going to encourage ~name~, aren’t you?
She doesn’t have a lot to say, but I’m sure she has a lot to show. ~name~, I mean. To ~player~.
As a new friend, ~player~, I… well, I think if ~name~’s a choice, if you’re into that kind of… person.
~name~, do you… uh, well, I guess you like who you like, which is a lot, not that it’s a bad thing, just that I bet you and ~player~ would get along!
Ohh, ~player~, she’s a smartie! ~name~, have you considered tutoring ~player~? In um, just about anything?
I’m glad to see ~player~ likes girls with big brains! A-and not just for their… um… anatomy. ~name~, do you like ~player~ too?
Hmm… ~Name~, you don’t mind someone else taking the lead, do you? I think ~player~ has something they’d like to ask you after the game!
~Name~’s pretty and witty! And so is ~player~! Um. Maybe you two should hang out, and be pretty and witty together!
Aww, ~name~, you’re really clever. Can you tell that you’d be a good match with ~player~?
You know, I can kind of get why ~player~ might find ~name~ interesting… I mean, I would never be like her, or be interested in her. Uh, I think it’s nice to want someone who really, really likes you!
~name~’s kind of… ~player~, are you sure? I get wanting someone who wants you but… isn’t it nice to be able to breathe? Literally and figuratively?
Oh! Megumin has a rival. How cute!
Most of the stuff I know about America I know from comic books. And All Might’s special moves.
Gunhead trained me in mixed martial arts! I’m actually really threatening in close combat. Hi-ya! Wh-whoa!
You know, I always did want to be a sorcerer growing up… Is that weird?
Hm… You’re part of that color-school. Beacon Academy, right, ~name~? I hear the heroes trained there are pretty flashy! And I’ve also heard you have a really great support program!
Oh, are you… A witch? Like, an actual one? I know some Quirks are mystical, but actual magic seems neat!
Oh no! Even when I'm trying to lose... argh! Sorry, ~name~!
Surrender your gun, Aimee!
Here she goes again…
Hey, wait a second, I think I recognize you. You’re Hawkeye Matchlock!
I always like to see a Quirk used to its utmost…
Aimee, I probably should’ve thought about this sooner…

Y-you’re so comfortable with this! B-but there’s so many people and it’s not like we’re changing into something else--!

… It must be hard not to be able to share your Quirk-- b-but it’s nice to share it in a way that makes you hap-happy I suppose!
N-n-not that Ladybug isn’t likely a super powerful hero! She has a ton of different Quirks, or a really strong one, it sounds! And her heart’s in the right place!
Yeah… well… heroes do it for the people, not the audience, I guess…
...T-take c-care of themselves. Like, what if Bakugo blew off his… o-or Todoroki burnt his bed… y-you know?
Ohmygodplaying with a teacher-- too--too--too too lewd!!!
...I’m guessing Megumin is the Bakugo in their friendship.
Um. Anyway, I think they fight pretty well as they are, or they certainly seem that way?
For a woman who’s trying so hard to look and act like an adult, you seem to have all kinds of weird hangups, Natsuki…
W-wait a second! I-- I could never keep a straight face for that!
I-I'm really embarrassed b-but it's-- the game isn't really s-so bad. I-I just thought there was a real emergency!
Aww. I wanted to see that a little earlier....
Is it rude if I just watch you, ~name~?
Go for it, Pit! If I can do it, you definitely can! Haven't you faced scarier villains than this?
Go for it, ~name~! We'll cheer you on... or just watch.
Remember, ~name~, Plus Ultra!
E-er. I-I guess everyone uses their Quirk for this...
I'm already getting wet again... Whatever Quirk ~name~ has, I'd love to study it...
Mmf. Does anyone else think ~name~ looks great?
I should take notes on this... For later.
H-how romantic. I think.
Um... are they allowed to do that...?
I didn't know you also had Zero Gravity, ~name~. Because you've got me floating...
W-what was that, Corrin? Some kind of dragon power... it reminds me of Ms. Ryukyu...
I-is anyone going to help him clean off? N-not that I'm volunteering...
H-huh? I was expecting... Something to come out...
Well, at least I got to go before you, ~name~!
See, I could do it, so you can too, ~name~!
Are you seriously going to--
W-w-wait! I-I'm so confused. Y-you're a projection, r-right? H-how?
You have a Quirk!? Wait, what?!
Y-you aren't going to... Er, start licking yourself, are you!?
W-what?
E-er, sorry Kyu. I didn’t mean to kind of just… Ignore you. But you’re a lot more forward about s-s-se-- stuff. S-so, um. Er. Have f-fun?
Oh so you also stay floating when you--
You’re keeping your glasses, even though you’re about to…?
R-really? Did you hide a... um... toy... in your hair? I guess... um. Hairy girls probably do that too...
Go back to being nice Pinkie, or else!
To-to-to be absolutely c-clear, this isn't what I wanted when I suggested conditioning.
Have fun, ~name~!
I'd give you a high five but that seems kind of gross right now...
She’s seriously going to.
W-whoa. Okay, that I didn't expect. You were here the whole time! You just have a body solidifying Quirk like Lemillion!
T-they're, you-- I-- I've heard of redeeming villains b-but!
Can you make clones of yourself, Elizabeth? Or is this something else?! It seems really strong, and you have to have a… Lot of control to… Use it like this…
T-that’s! I-!
N-not that I always do!
W-w-what a weird Quirk!
O-oh. Oh wow. Oh wow. I've... never thought of that.
T-though, maybe you just need to get off? I um... I might relate to that.
Oh!
Hmm... You use that finger? Interesting...
Looking good, ~name~!
H-how romantic. I think.
Um... are they allowed to do that...?
T-that's a catchy song, Nagisa!
(I float, balloons float... maybe I should try that sometime...)
Um... I've never... while drunk... how is it, Remi?
I-I figure most people use their Quirk. For reasons like this. S-so, if you're not embarrassed I-I-I shouldn't be.
This raises so many questions. N-n-not questions I want the answer to, but questions!
Welcome to the loser's bench, ~name~. It's got good company, at least!
Aimee! Oh no! Mercy, can you patch her up!?
Sei, do you have anything left you can use to patch her up!?
Aimee! Oh no! Can we get a medic over here?
I guess you're just a really good singer... and your Quirk is something entirely different. Or maybe not. Deku might be able to explain it...
This was... very unusual, Nayru. Er... (K-kind of hot thought...)
Yeeowch! N-no, forget what I said! Er, what I was thinking! About the balloons and--!
This was fun!
I'm sorry if I didn't manage to keep anyone safe, but I hope my... Heroic display was worth it!
Hmm.... Sorry, was just spacing out.
So um. How'd I do?
O-of course I'm not a threat, Jotaro! I'm a hero! I-I'd have thought that'd be obvious!
I-I can't share my Quirk with you. Only villains do that!
Mahiru! I better not see that picture anywhere!
Yes! Yes, Mahiru! I actually mind a lot!
Well, it doesn't help that I've been a little distracted!
I've still got plenty of control, watch!
It's hard to manipulate gravity over and over again, but you'd get really tired too, Meia!
O-oh! I. I was expecting something way dirtier. Um… Well, I guess something to do with building things, but I'm very happy with Zero Gravity!
M-my...? O-oh, right. I'm fine! Thanks for asking, Pit!
Ow! My poor butt... okay. Sometimes I lose control a little bit...
It's getting kind of cold here...
I wish you'd all finish up already, I want to get dressed...
I'm still shaking from that.
Oh. Oh no. I usually don't get sick when I... Phew. It just passed!
Phew. This was fun. I'd probably recommend this to some of my other friends!
I hope ~player~ met someone gorgeous here tonight! Good luck to you two!
For such an embarrassing game, there's a lot of kindness here. Maybe fate'll be kind to ~name~ and whoever she um... you know, liked.
~Player~, lots of elegant, proud ladies here tonight. S-since you two've already gotten to know each other... maybe you should... it only makes sense!

Good job, ~name~! Since it looks like this is going to be a pretty social outing after this, how do you feel about the others coming, Saki? It’s um. It’s not like they haven’t… er… come in front of us before…
~name~, you played very well, though I wish we could’ve met under less awkward circumstances. Er, you’re a hero in your own way, for helping make a new friendship though!

~player~, Plus Ultra work! I wish we’d gotten a chance to meet literally anywhere else, but if you wanted to come hang out with Saki, Futaba, and I after we’re done with our hangout, I wouldn’t mind getting dinner after the singing and drinking.

W-well, good job, ~player~, I hope you… uh, enjoyed this. I think I’m going to go try and pretend like this was mostly just a way to get to make a few new friends. I’ll see Marinette and Saki tomorrow, though, maybe we should spend time together after that?
H-hey, ~player~? D-do you want to do something next? I have some questions about your Quirk... i-if you don't mind...
Well played, Saki. I hope you're still into all that stuff we planned to do tomorrow!
Well played, Saki. I hope you're still into all that stuff we planned to do tomorrow!

scene.directive: Oh, hi!
~name~, right?
Let me think, we met at...
...Oh, yeah.
...You don't have to say it.
I remember it perfectly.
(Whether I try to or not...)
Yeah, it was kind of really awkward.
...But at the same time...
...Sort of really fun?
And now that you're here.
With me, and all.
And I should be taking a break from my patrol soon anyway...
We could always...
...Y'know.
...Duck into that alleyway for a sec?
Maybe?
Please?
Oh, this is great!
Perfect, even.
I don't think anyone's going to bother us here...
Far away from any possible interruptions...
Sorry, but, would you mind maybe... Looking away for a second while I unzip my costume?
I know it's silly of me, all things considered. It's just...
You know how it is when you're so used to doing things one way that it becomes hard to break, regardless of any and all logic?
Plus, you've already seen me... strip... anyway, so, it's not like you're missing out.
I know it's not the best place to set the mood, either.
An alleyway like this is...
...Sort of creepy, right?
It's like the sort of place that that Hero Killer guy would lure his victims, right?
Man, that Stain guy was so...
...totally...
...AWESOME!
Right?
No, no, shhh, don't scream!
I only need a teensy-weensy little bit of your blood, 'kay?
It won't hurt that much, it's just like at the doctor's.
Except, here, the needle is just a little bit bigger!
But don't worry! It'll all be over soon.
There we go. That wasn't so bad, was it?
See, that's your blood right there. Suck, suck, suck~! ❤
And you're helping me out so much by doing this!
See, us villains, if we wanna play at the Inventory, we have to fill out aaaaaaallllll this paperwork.
Just piles and piles of forms and -blech- who has time for that?
So I figured that I could get around all that if I just made myself look like one of the usual clientele!
Doesn't it feel nice to help a friend like this?
I mean, we are friends now, right?
(You saw me naked, after all...)
Oh! All done! ❤
You might be a little tired after that, so get some rest, 'kay?
You're going to need it for what's coming.
Hope I see you again, new friend!
~name~? Are you awake..?
H-hey there…
I'm so glad you're okay. Everyone's been so worried about you…!
I'm so ashamed about all of this. If I hadn't let her take my blood all those years ago…
You wouldn't have had to volunteer for that… or um… you know… gotten so distracted by her...
They're putting me on leave for a bit while they figure out what to do. So I um. Wanted to come make sure you were okay.
Is there… Anything I can do to make it up to you?
You acted so bravely and… so heroic. I need to pay you back somehow!
W-what? I-it's not like I have a Quirk that'll let me kiss it better, ~name~!
T-though…
If it would help you feel better…
Okay. I'll… just… lean in… and...
Mmm. Mmm…
W-wow. You're…
Good… at this…
I… Whew. Sorry, let me catch my breath. I think I'll need it… in a minute…
The doctors say your Quirk… works best when you… you know. Finish, ~name~.
That's why we needed you for the Inventory mission and… well, it’s late… everyone else in the ward is asleep or gone…
W-well. You were so brave for me… I should be brave for you. And… I'd give you. M-more but… you know. You're injured.
Let me do this for you, ~name~.
Let me help you find a release of your own. Okay?
